title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1509/94 of 29 June 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3472/85 on the buying-in and storage of olive oil by intervention agencies
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1509/94 of 29 June 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3472/85 on the buying-in and storage of olive oil by intervention agencies
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3472/85 (3) is amended as follows:
1. In the second paragraph of Article 1, the words 'may not be more than 8 %' are replaced by 'may not be more than 6 %'.
2. In Article 2 (4) (a) the words 'in Annexes II, III, VIII, IX, XA and B and XI' are replaced by the words 'in Annexes II, III, IV, VIII, IX, XA and B and XI'.
3. In the second subparagraph of Article 3 (4) the words 'for the 1992/93 marketing year' are deleted.
4. The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3472/85 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1994.
However, until 31 October 1994, Annex A to this Regulation shall apply instead of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3472/85.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 172, 30. 9. 1966, p. 3025/66.
(2) OJ No L 285, 20. 11. 1993, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 333, 11. 12. 1985, p. 5.
